about_the_game: "Afterblast" is an exhilarating, high-octane multiplayer first-person shooter that takes action to new heights with its dynamic parkour mechanics. Set in a post-apocalyptic world, players navigate through crumbling urban landscapes, leaping across rooftops and scaling walls while engaging in intense combat. With a diverse arsenal of futuristic weapons and gadgets, every match is a fast-paced adrenaline rush where strategy and agility are key. Whether you're dodging enemy fire or executing precise acrobatic maneuvers, "Afterblast" delivers a heart-pounding experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat. Join the fight, master your parkour skills, and dominate the battlefield in this ultimate test of reflexes and tactics.

Set in a post-apocalyptic world, players navigate through crumbling urban landscapes, leaping across rooftops and scaling walls while engaging in intense combat. With a diverse arsenal of futuristic weapons and gadgets, every match is a fast-paced adrenaline rush where strategy and agility are key. Whether you're dodging enemy fire or executing precise acrobatic maneuvers, "Afterblast" delivers a heart-pounding experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat. Join the fight, master your parkour skills, and dominate the battlefield in this ultimate test of reflexes and tactics.
name: Afterblast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 or Intel i5
  • Graphics: GT 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 or Intel i5
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Afterblast" is a high-octane multiplayer first-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players engage in intense combat with futuristic weapons, navigating urban ruins using parkour. Master agility and strategy in dynamic environments for a thrilling, adrenaline-pumping experience.
